General.Name: Chip Hope Co. Ltd
General.Description: Chip Hope Co., Ltd engages in the design, manufacture, trading, and catering of computer equipment and related software. The company offers electronic component materials, finished products, and semiconductors; communication, mechanical, electrical, general, other optical and precision, and medical equipment; and measuring instruments, as well as integrated caller ID telephone modules and switch systems. It also engages in the general hotel, restaurant, and food wholesale industries. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
